ur_rna.Utilities

Class CommandLineParser.Argument

  • java.lang.Object
    • ur_rna.Utilities.CommandLineParser.Argument
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CommandLineParser.FlagArg, CommandLineParser.UnnamedArg
    Enclosing class:
    CommandLineParser

    public abstract static class CommandLineParser.Argument
extends java.lang.Object
    Arguments are the results of parsing a commandline. There are two types of arguments: flags (aka named arguments), represented by CommandLineParser.FlagArg objects and unnamed arguments, represented by CommandLineParser.UnnamedArg objects.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.String fullText
      The full original text of this Argument in the command line.
      int position
      The position of this Argument in the parsed command line.
